pronunciation.pinyin: chéng yě xiāo hé , bài yě xiāo hé
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: cheng2 ye3 Xiao1 He2 , bai4 ye3 Xiao1 He2

meanings.value: lit. raised up by Xiao He, cast down by Xiao He , alluding to Han Xin 韓信|韩信[Han2 Xin4] being made Grand General 大將軍|大将军[da4 jiang1 jun1]
fig. a situation where one's success and failure are both due to the same factor
